name: Doodlebug (itch)
description:
A snake is driven forward by strange music! It descends a treacherous notebook to find the source...

Doodlebug is a music driven arcade game inspired by the classic game "Snake."

This project was made in two weeks for P.I.G. Squad's "Summer Slow Jam." In this jam, developers were tasked to create a "Music-First" game. The theme of the jam was "Ghost Notes."

The Team:

Chris Henager - Programming

twitter - https://twitter.com/HenagerChris

George Dunn - Art

instagram - https://www.instagram.com/godunn12/?hl=en
